2.caption_en:
A two-part slide template prompting the user to define a platform’s core value proposition and to explain its positive impact on society and the environment, including circular economy and sustainability considerations.

{
  "artifact_type": "template_slide",
  "language": "en",
  "title": "CORE VALUE PROPOSITION(S)",
  "sections": [
    {
      "title": "CORE VALUE PROPOSITION(S)",
      "body": "What is the core value proposition / service of the platform? (see also platform patterns)",
      "background_color": "#FFFFFF",
      "text_color": "#5B5B5B",
      "alignment": "center"
    },
    {
      "title": "IMPACT TO ECOSYSTEM",
      "body": "What is the positive impact to Society and Environment? How does the platform incorporates circular economy aspects and helps to achieve sustainability goals?",
      "background_color": "#CFEFAF",
      "text_color": "#5B5B5B",
      "alignment": "center"
    }
  ],
  "layout_summary": "Two stacked sections: a large white upper area for core value proposition and a green lower band for ecosystem impact; teal border and circular teal header accent at top center.",
  "primary_colors": [
    "#FFFFFF",
    "#CFEFAF",
    "#3EB6B6"
  ],
  "text_style": "centered sans-serif, medium gray headings and lighter gray body copy",
  "ocr_raw": "CORE VALUE PROPOSITION(S)\n\nWhat is the core value proposition / service\nof the platform? (see also platform patterns)\n\nIMPACT TO ECOSYSTEM\n\nWhat is the positive impact to Society and\nEnvironment? How does the platform\nincorporates circular economy aspects and\nhelps to achieve sustainability goals?"
}
